text: The 2016 Intermediate League World Series took place from July 31–August 7 in Livermore, California, United States. Wailuku, Hawaii defeated Seoul, South Korea in the championship game. ==Teams== {| class="wikitable" |- bgcolor="#bebebe" ! United States !
